page.title: 11THE NEWTON STEWART CINEMA
page.content: Originally there were about five cinemas in our area.Now there is only the one in Newton Stewart left. Our cinema has always been{privately owned.Like many other cinemas it is struggling to stay in business. Films are shown every evening{except Sunday and Monday but there are now no matinees.The same film may be on for five days or even for as long as ten days. Each evening there is a short film first,followed by local adverts and then the main film. The admission for adults is Â£1 for the stalls and Â£1.50 for the circle. Children have to pay from 50p to Â£1.
